Reviews.Title: KONICA 35MM TOPS 4 ME
Reviews.Author: EDDY
Reviews.Content: I COLLECT AND STILL USE  KONICA 35MM CAMERAS  NOT WITH MINOLTA --THIS ONE I HAVE FOR OVER 13 YEARS --  ITS A GREAT 35MM AND ASY TO USE--PHOTOS COME OUT VERY CLEAR SHARP-  AND WHEN I USE BLACK AND WHITE FILM--ALSOI ONLY USE KODACK FILM---  ITS STILL A FUN CAMERA  AND THERE ARE PLACES THAT DEVELOPE FILM--  AND YES OF CORCE I USE DIGITAL  CAMERAS  --I HAVE REAL GOOD NIKON--AND FUJI  I DO ALL KINDS PHOTO WORK--  AS WELL AS SOME MODELS ON ONE MODEL PLACE OTHER--  I STILL BRING MY KONICA WITH ME EXTRA FILM-- YES BATTERIES  IF YOU STILL LIKE USEING 35 MM  LIKE I DO--  I WOULD RECOMEND THIS KONCIA /  OTHER CHOICES AS FAR AS OTHER MODELS OF KONICA PRODUCTS  THANKS  EDDY

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in flash with several mode options
35-60mm, 1.71x lens for sharp images
Print the date and a title on images
Comes with camera, protective case, batteries, and carrying strap
Compact and lightweight for easy portability and storage
ProductInfo.Name: Konica Z-UP 60 Date 35mm Camera
